channel.title: Linux on Roger J. Bos, CFA
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Roger J. Bos, CFA

item.title: Linux Notes
item.description: I am a huge fan of linux. I enjoy ssh-ing into servers and using the command line, but since I don’t necessarily use linux every day, I sometimes forget some of the commands, so I keep this reference for myself. Linux Commands df shows the amount of free space on your drive free shows the amount of free memory on your machine. history shows a list of previous commands.
